name: Mochi Man Jump
description: Mochi Man Jump is about a character that escapes an are by jumping on blocks but asteroids are falling down on him and there are power ups and boosts. Use left and right arrow keys to move and space bar or shift to jump. (You can also use the buttons on the screen but those were meant for mobile). This game was made for FRIENDS AND FAMILY but everyone can play it but it isn't the full game just an alpha version so it may have bugs.
